attributes.action: Everyone be able to go toilet in lessons
attributes.additional_details: Make it a rule for teachers and schools to allow people to go toilet in lessons
attributes.background: Make schools allow students to go toilets in lessons as on many accounts they cant hold it but get told no

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Require schools to let children use the toilet at all times in the school day
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731355
